name: MAXIVE
short_description:
M - Maintenance 
A - Application 
X - eXtendable 
I - Interface 
V - Variable 
E - Engineering

MAXIVE is an application framework providing a foundation of fundamental, multiple user application 
components. MAXIVE strives to provide stable solutions for SSL encrypted user and group management, record and report management.  MAXIVE strives to achieve a strategically planned open source, foundational architecture which leverages several best of breed open source enterprise class, N-Tier architecture components.
summary: Maintenance Application eXtendable Interface Variable Engineering
